Text: Writing on Twitter, Transport Secretary Grant Shapps said more than 70 rescue flights were planned for Thursday repatriating around 17K more people if all goes to plan.
Effect: Writing on Twitter, Transport Secretary Grant Shapps said more than 70 rescue flights were planned for Thursday repatriating around 17K more people
